subject: Bankruptcies
Baseball
Decisions and Verdicts
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: A federal judge ruled that Bernard L. Madoff must decide certain critical legal issues before the case proceeds, a victory for the owners of the Mets, who have argued that the trustee has misconstrued the law.
snippet: A federal judge ruled that Bernard L. Madoff must decide certain critical legal issues before the case proceeds, a victory for the owners of the Mets, who have argued that the trustee has misconstrued the law.
